l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe a website or app you use often. You should say:
What it is
How often you use it
What you use it for
And explain why you like it.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I'd like to talk about Instagram, which has become Indispensable [不可或缺的] in my daily life. It is very User-friendly [用户友好的] and Innovative [创新的]. I use it every day to see Breathtaking [惊人的] photos. Since it is so Efficient [高效的] for staying connected, I often feel Isolated [孤立的] without it. However, it is quite Addictive [令人上瘾的]. I often find myself Glued to the screen [粘在屏幕上] with the world At your fingertips [触手可及]. It is easy to Lose track of time [忘记时间] while scrolling through endless feeds of content. I honestly cannot imagine my daily routine without checking this app first thing in the morning.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- App: Instagram / WeChat
- Use: Chat / Photos
- Like: Fast / Fun
- Bad: Wastes time

l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe a piece of technology you find difficult to use. You should say:
What it is
Why you bought it
What makes it difficult
And explain how you deal with it.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I'm going to describe a professional camera I bought, which is definitely not User-friendly [用户友好的]. I bought it to take Breathtaking [惊人的] photos, hoping it would be Efficient [高效的]. Although it has Innovative [创新的] features, the complex menu makes me feel Isolated [孤立的] and confused. I thought having settings At your fingertips [触手可及] would be great, but it is just hard. I often get Glued to the screen [粘在屏幕上] trying to fix it and Lose track of time [忘记时间]. It is not Addictive [令人上瘾的] at all, but learning it is Indispensable [不可或缺的] for my hobby. I hope that with more practice, I will eventually master it completely.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Tech: Camera / Drone
- Hard: Buttons / Menu
- Deal: Study / Ask
- Result: Good photos

l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe an app or website that helps you learn something. You should say:
What it is
How you found out about it
What you learn from it
And explain how it helps you.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I wish to talk about Duolingo, an Innovative [创新的] app that makes learning languages User-friendly [用户友好的]. It puts education At your fingertips [触手可及], so you never feel Isolated [孤立的]. Because the lessons are short and Efficient [高效的], it is easy to become Addictive [令人上瘾的] and study daily. I often get Glued to the screen [粘在屏幕上] and Lose track of time [忘记时间] while practicing. It has become Indispensable [不可或缺的] for my progress. The results I have achieved are simply Breathtaking [惊人的] and motivating. I plan to continue using it until I am completely fluent in Spanish. It is truly helpful.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- App: Duolingo / Khan
- Learn: Language / Math
- Help: Fun / Easy
- Future: Fluent / Smart

l2_part3_questions.question: How has the internet changed the way we communicate?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] From my perspective [观点/视角], it has revolutionized [彻底改变] our daily Interaction [互动]. [Reason] We can now contact anyone instantly, regardless of distance, which reduces feelings of being alone. [Example] Whereas in the past we waited weeks for letters, now Digitalization [数字化] allows us to be a Social butterfly [交际花] online every day. However, this creates a heavy Dependency [依赖] on our devices to function socially. It has truly changed everything about how we connect.

l2_part3_questions.question: Is technology always a good thing?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Unfortunately, I don't think so. It is clearly a Double-edged sword [双刃剑]. [Reason] While it connects us to the world, it also threatens our Privacy [隐私] significantly. [Example] Even though Cybersecurity [网络安全] exists, hackers [黑客] can still steal personal data easily if we are not careful. We must be vigilant not to share too much personal information online. Safety should always come first.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Health. Reason: Eyes. Example: Too much screen time.

l2_part3_questions.question: Will robots replace humans in the future?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] It is highly likely that they will replace many manual jobs. [Reason] Urbanization [城市化] demands more efficiency and speed than humans can provide. [Example] Provided that Digitalization [数字化] continues to advance, robots will handle repetitive tasks in factories and homes. However, they lack the human touch needed for Therapeutic [有治疗作用的] roles like nursing. Humans will always be needed for care.

l2_part3_questions.question: How can we stay safe online?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] I believe the best way is to prioritize [优先考虑] strong Cybersecurity [网络安全] measures. [Reason] We face constant threats from scammers and viruses that target our data. [Example] Unless we protect our Privacy [隐私] with complex passwords, we risk serious identity theft. We should also avoid Information overload [信息过载] by trusting only verifiable and safe sources. Being cautious is the only way to stay safe.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Passwords. Reason: Hard to guess. Example: Using numbers and symbols.

l2_part3_questions.question: What is the impact of technology on education?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Unquestionably, the impact is huge and transformative. [Reason] It enhances learning through better Interaction [互动] with digital materials and videos. [Example] Since Digitalization [数字化] brings books to our screens, students can learn anywhere and at any time. However, relying on it too much creates a problematic Dependency [依赖] on gadgets. Balance is key to effective learning.

l2_part3_questions.question: Do people rely on technology too much?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] It seems to me that we definitely do. [Reason] Our Dependency [依赖] on smartphones for simple tasks is alarming. [Example] While apps can be Therapeutic [有治疗作用的] for stress, they also cause Information overload [信息过载] and anxiety. We are forgetting how to live without them, which is a serious issue for society. We need to disconnect sometimes.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Maps. Reason: Can't navigate [导航]. Example: Getting lost without GPS.
